alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 5:47AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Cook and east central Lake Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 546 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Tofte, or 29 miles southwest of Grand Marais, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained spotter reported pea-size hail at 545 AM. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Eagle Mountain around 610 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Brule Lake, Cherokee Lake, Cascade Lake, Poplar Lake, Temperance River State Park, White Pine Lake, Tail Lake, Crescent Lake, Sawbill Lake and Caribou Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
